name: Archangel
text: Archangel, angel or devil? Our RPGPlayer industry experts have played, analyzed and judged Archangel: the latest three-dimensional Action Adventure with a role-playing vocation and rather disturbing accents. Find out with us, therefore, if Archangel deserves to be added to your personal collection of video games. And if you are still not convinced you can delve even further into the subject with the other material that we make available to you. First Look Demo review in English
